1: phyogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig <mistake>gis//lus</mistake> can rnams kyi tshe <mistake>'gro'o//rtsa</mistake> ba nas gcig lhag <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>yis//g.yon</mistake> <mistake>par</mistake> zla <mistake>ba'i</mistake> rgyu bar <mistake>'gyur//nyi</mistake> zla nyin zhag zla ba <mistake>drag /nyin</mistake> zhag gsum rnams
2: zla ba <mistake>gsum//nyin</mistake> la <mistake>'chi</mistake> ltas zla bar <mistake>dge/'phel</mistake> 'grib de nas 'di dag <mistake>la//dbu</mistake> ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba <mistake>ni//lo</mistake> brgya yongs su rdzogs pa <mistake>yis// mnyam</mistake> dang <mistake>ma</mistake> mnyam nyin zhag <mistake>rnams//</mistake>
3: skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor <mistake>gyis//de</mistake> rgyu g.yas dang g.yon la <mistake>yang//phyogs</mistake> gnyis rnam par nyams pa <mistake>las//gzhan</mistake> du <mistake>'ci</mistake> bar mi 'gyur <mistake>te//phyogs</mistake> gnyis yang dag gnas pa <mistake>na//</mistake>
4: g.yas dang g.yon pa'i kun spyod <mistake>dang//dkyil</mistake> 'khor lnga rnams 'bab pa'i <mistake>phyir//'chi</mistake> <mistake>ltasa</mistake> mtshan nyid shes nas <mistake>ni//srog</mistake> ni thig ler gzhug par <mistake>bya//a</mistake> ba <mistake>d+u</mistake> <mistake>tri'i</mistake> zha bas brten nas //
5: mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par <mistake>bya//rtag</mistake> tu rdo rje bslang bar <mistake>bya// zla</mistake> <mistake>nyi'i</mistake> bgrod pa 'joms pa <mistake>las//gzhan</mistake> du kun <mistake>dar</mistake> yan lag <mistake>la//srog</mistake> gi rlung ni 'jug pa <mistake>med //'og</mistake> <mistake>tu'ang</mistake> dung can ma
6: <mistake>zhur</mistake> <mistake>sel// de</mistake> ma zhugs las 'chi <mistake>ba'o //'chi</mistake> ltas bslu ba rnal 'byor <mistake>ba'i//'di</mistake> ni dga' ba rnams kyis <mistake>'gyur//mgo</mistake> <mistake>bo'i</mistake> <mistake>pad+ma</mistake> gtsug tor <mistake>las///khu</mistake> ba 'ongs pa dga' ba <mistake>ste// mgrin</mistake>
7: pa snying khar mchog dga' <mistake>bo// dga'</mistake> bral dga' ba de nas <mistake>'gyur//sna</mistake> <mistake>tshogs</mistake> dga' ba lte ba <mistake>dang//gsang</mistake> <mistake>za'i</mistake> pad+mar gang 'ongs <mistake>pa'o//gsang</mistake> gnas rdo <mistake>je</mistake> nor <mistake>bu'i</mistake> <mistake>bar//lhan</mistake> cig skyes <mistake>dgal</mistake>
8: <mistake>mi'pho</mistake> <mistake>ba//rab</mistake> gnas mya <mistake>dan</mistake> <mistake>'das pa</mistake> <mistake>mian//chags</mistake> chen mi 'gyur khyab bdag <mistake>go/'dod</mistake> chags bral las 'pho med <mistake>bde// de</mistake> ni mya <mistake>ngan</mistake> 'das rab <mistake>gnas// khu</mistake> ba zla char gtsug tor <mistake>du//</mistake>
